value:
I'm saving the best gift for Lady
Sakura, but I've also got something
for Subaki. He's earned that much.

Isn't this kimono great? I'd like to
bring it back to the capital sometime,
if I ever get the chance.

Getting gifts is nice, of course, but
don't you think the gift givers are the
ones actually having the most fun?

This festival's about showing your
love and gratitude, right?$k$pSakura... I mean, Lady Sakura! I'm so
glad I get to be here with you!

Hey! Knowing what the gift is ahead
of time takes all the fun out of it!

Your friend sent me here to give you
a token of their appreciation. I guess
that makes me a messenger of love!

This is so much fun! Way too much
for just one person—I'm going to
have to share it with everyone!

Oh, don't worry! I've got gifts for
friends as well!
Oh no... Do you not like that flavor?

Today's a day for honesty, right?
That's why...I'm grateful to you for
everything you do!

Hana, the messenger of love, is here!
Even festivals are serious business,
so I'll deliver these gifts in a flash!

I gave a gift to Lady Sakura, and she
said thank you, as always, but...do
you know what she said after that?$k$pShe said, "The fact that you've
become a great samurai makes me
happier than any gift could." Really!$k$pI just... How am I supposed to
respond to that? I almost started
crying right then and there!$k$pTalk about unfair... I was trying to give
her a gift, but she went and gave me
something so much bigger.$k$pIt's moments like this that really
remind me what I'm thankful for.$k$pThat's why I'm going to learn even
more, so that I can be useful to
Sakura—I mean, to Lady Sakura!$k$pOh, right! Here's your gift. It's my
favorite: dried mandarin oranges!
I promise you'll love them!
Thanks, as always!
I'm grateful to you.
Got a gift for ya!
Do you like it?
Wrong gift...
Getting to attend the Day of Devotion festival with Lady Sakura is like a dream come true!
Ah! Hey, watch it! This is a gift for somebody!
Isn't this kimono beautiful? I just love the cherry-blossom pattern!
Do you even need to ask? Of course I've gotten a gift for Lady Sakura! Oh, and Subaki.
We could all be a bit better about expressing our gratitude more often.
Becoming a great samurai is the best gift I can give. I just hope that's enough...
Here, this is for you! As thanks for everything!
Sounds good!
Tough call.
Let's go, let's go!
